argument.name: Result
argument.description: A character string with seven comma delimited fields: the first is NULL, and the last six are set to zero.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_REMEMBERED_CLEAR() function clears any remembered alignment, size, or position data from the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Alpha Software\Alpha Five 6.0\xdialog key in the system registry.

section.description: This example runs a dialog, asks what its settings were, clears them, and asks again.
